author: ianna
body:
* Remove TOBConnect56 (copy 1, 2, 5, and 6) intersection with TOBCFTube4
* Move TOBConnect56 (copy 3 and 4) out of TOBCFTube3

TOBConnect56 copies were moved along Z by +/- 2 mm. See attached screenshots (before and after the bugfix).
Sensitive volumes are not affected, nor new overlaps were introduced.

![screenshot 2017-01-18 10 16 24](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1390682/22058248/942f72b4-dd68-11e6-81fc-578343c91094.png)
![screenshot 2017-01-18 10 18 26](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/1390682/22058247/942f428a-dd68-11e6-9d2b-593d2fa45a9b.png)
title: TOB Connectors Overlap Bugfix
